Item.Description:
This operation performs a selection between two values or objects depending on a condition
**Examples:**
- if the condition is **True**, return a cube; if **False**, return a cylinder
- with a list of test values and two lists for results, each condition is evaluated elementwise:
(if the lists are of different lengths, their size is automatically adjusted by repeating the last element of each list until the largest length is reached)
`Condition = [False, False, False, False, False, True, False, ...]`
`OnTrue = ['A', 'B', ..., 'Z']`
`OnFalse = [0, 1, ..., 10]`
